name: Shoppers Drug Mart - Cambridge - Dundas St N
comment:
General pharmacy
  • treatment and prescription of medications for common medical ailments, including rashes, pink eye, insect bites, acne, and urinary tract infections
  • prescription of COVID-19 antiviral treatment (Paxlovid)
  • certified diabetes educator (CDE) available for consultations
  • medication placed in blister packs (sealed, push-through packaging used to separate doses) at no extra cost
  • free seasonal flu vaccines
  • basic home health care supplies
  • basic compounding

Pharmacy Smoking Cessation Program - Help to quit smoking, available for Ontario Drug Benefit recipients

MedsCheck - Appointments to review complex prescriptions with a pharmacist

Sharps Disposal Program - Safe disposal of syringes, pen needles, lancets, insulin pump infusion supplies, and test strips
serviceProvisionCode: Dispensing fee plus medication costs * prescribed medications may be covered by OHIP

description_of_this:
General pharmacy
  • treatment and prescription of medications for common medical ailments, including rashes, pink eye, insect bites, acne, and urinary tract infections
  • prescription of COVID-19 antiviral treatment (Paxlovid)
  • certified diabetes educator (CDE) available for consultations
  • medication placed in blister packs (sealed, push-through packaging used to separate doses) at no extra cost
  • free seasonal flu vaccines
  • basic home health care supplies
  • basic compounding

Pharmacy Smoking Cessation Program - Help to quit smoking, available for Ontario Drug Benefit recipients

MedsCheck - Appointments to review complex prescriptions with a pharmacist

Sharps Disposal Program - Safe disposal of syringes, pen needles, lancets, insulin pump infusion supplies, and test strips, Codes: Dispensing fee plus medication costs * prescribed medications may be covered by OHIP, Features: Wheelchair Accessible, Languages: English, Address: 115 Dundas St N, Unit 1, Cambridge, ON, N1R 5T8, Location: lat: 43.3593, lon: -80.2941, Contact: phone: 519-623-5920, fax: 519-623-5280, email: asdm720@shoppersdrugmart.ca, url: www1.shoppersdrugmart.ca/en/store-locator/store/720
